problem_statement:
A media company is launching a new digital publication and needs a clean, modern web interface for displaying their editorial content. The current WordPress site feels dated and loads slowly on mobile devices, causing readers to abandon articles before finishing. The editorial team wants a fresh design inspired by publications like The Verge and Medium that prioritizes readability and visual appeal.
The system needs to display articles in an attractive grid layout with featured content sections, support filtering by content categories, and provide a distraction-free reading experience for individual articles. User research indicated that 84 percent of readers prefer a clean layout without sidebar advertisements, article pages with good typography increase average read time by 45 percent, and category-based navigation is used by 62 percent of returning visitors to find specific content types.
FAIL_TO_PASS: Home Page › should display the page title
Home Page › should display category navigation bar
Home Page › should display all available categories
Home Page › should display hero articles prominently
Home Page › should display article grid below hero section
Home Page › should display article cards with required information
Home Page › should filter articles by category when category button is clicked
Home Page › should highlight selected category
Home Page › should show all articles when "All" is selected
Home Page › should have hover effects on article cards
Home Page › should display at least 12 articles
Home Page › should have articles from at least 4 different categories
Home Page › should have at least 2-3 articles per category
Article Detail Page › should display article when valid ID is accessed
Article Detail Page › should display complete article information
Article Detail Page › should have a visible Back button/link
Article Detail Page › should display 404 page for invalid article ID
Article Detail Page › should display different articles for different IDs
Article Detail Page › should have proper typography styling
Article Detail Page › should display article with proper image dimensions
Article Detail Page › should display all article fields correctly
User Interactions › should have hover effects on article cards
User Interactions › should show visual feedback when hovering over category buttons
User Interactions › should filter articles immediately when category is clicked
User Interactions › should maintain filter state during page interaction
User Interactions › should have clickable article cards
User Interactions › should have accessible category buttons
User Interactions › should handle rapid category switching
Responsive Design › should display single column layout on mobile
Responsive Design › should display multi-column layout on tablet
Responsive Design › should display multi-column layout on desktop
Responsive Design › should adapt hero section on mobile
Responsive Design › should adapt hero section on desktop
Responsive Design › should maintain readability on all screen sizes

Responsive Design › should handle article detail page on desktop
